rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0002
rows.name: Problem? Yeah, you could say that.

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0003
rows.name:
All right, so you know that they refine
Core Chips in the palace?

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Ether gets collected in the plaza's
ether furnace. That's then channeled
into the palace for refinement.

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0005
rows.name:
And because the ether runs beneath
the capital, it means the temperature
here's much warmer than the outside.

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Since the ether furnace is always
running day in, day out, it absolutely
has to have regular inspections.

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Thing is, due to a certain incident,
we're too short-staffed to find anyone
who can check up on the furnace.

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0008
rows.name:
You'll lend us some manpower?
Oh, that's fantastic news!

rows.label: tlk44310185_04_msg0009
rows.name:
So we'll be able to keep on top of the
inspections after all and Teos Aure can
stay nice and toasty!
